PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Izravni odabir dostave u Paketomat ili PaketShop nije moguć. Paket se može preusmjeriti u PaketShop. Dodatne troškove snosi klijent !

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: Izravni odabir dostave u Paketomat ili PaketShop nije moguć. Paket se može preusmjeriti u Paketomat. Dodatne troškove snosi klijent !

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the standard option. Parcel shop (PaketShop) and parcel locker (Paketomat) delivery are available only as a redirection option after the parcel is shipped, not directly at checkout. In-store pickup is explicitly unavailable.
PROVIDERS: GLS is the sole courier mentioned for all deliveries.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs €4.99, with free shipping on orders over €40. Redirecting a package to a parcel shop or locker incurs unspecified additional costs to be paid by the customer.
RESTRICTIONS & TIME: Delivery time is up to 10 working days. No deliveries are made on Saturdays, Sundays, or public holidays. Information on island surcharges or bulky item delivery is not provided.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery is mentioned as a payment option, but any associated surcharge is not specified. Customers can track and redirect their parcels via a link sent by GLS.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is found on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is generally straightforward. However, it lacks detail on potential COD surcharges, the exact cost of redirecting a package, and specific policies for island deliveries or bulky items. The process for using parcel shops/lockers (only via redirection) could be clearer.
